title: The Forever Plan
description: She was the love of my life and I broke her heart. Now she’s back in town with her sights set on me.Willa and I were meant to defy the odds of young love. And the reason we didn’t was entirely my fault.She left town, moved to another state for veterinary school while I became known as Landry’s grumpiest bartender. They’re not wrong—I’m a miserable loner. Keeping myself guarded became my only defense.And it was working… until she walked back into my bar.Willa’s veterinary internship brought her home, but no matter how much I glower, brush her off, or walk away, she’s always there, persistent in her pursuit of closure—and friendship.It’s torture. The worst kind of bittersweet agony.Because I never stopped loving her.But after her internship ends, she’s not staying in Landry. And I can’t leave.Pretending I’m not still in love with Willa Moore might be the only way I’ll get through these next few months with my heart intact.• • • • • • •The Forever Plan is a steamy, angsty, grump/sunshine, second chance, standalone small town romance in the interconnected Landry Love Series.
author: Amy Alves
